# isSkipBackwardEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether backward-skipping is available.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isSkipBackwardEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property affects the appearance of the backward-skipping indicator. The value you set for the player view controller’s [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVPlayerViewController/skippingBehavior] property determines its backward-skipping behavior.

## Configuring skipping behavior

- **isSkipForwardEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether forward-skipping is available.
- **skippingBehavior**: The behavior that skipping gestures perform.
- **AVPlayerViewControllerSkippingBehavior**: Constants that represent the player view controller’s skipping behavior.
